body:
Hello everyone! I've been on Avicus for a while and recently joined the forums with the sole purpose of making and posting maps.

I then realized what a great community is here!

Now, I'm in the Introduce Yourself thread writing this.

Have a great day.

#ShareYourStory

title: Hello!

replies.body:
Well, welcome to the forum family!
#ForumFamily :P
replies.body_tagged:
Well, welcome to the forum family!
#ForumFamily :P

replies.body: Welcome you seem nice by the way the fourms have alot more than maps so enjoy the entire avicus not just the phsical gameplay
replies.body_tagged: Welcome you seem nice by the way the fourms have alot more than maps so enjoy the entire avicus not just the phsical gameplay

replies.body: Welcome! You're already active on the forums from what I can see, and I look forward to talking with you :)
replies.body_tagged: Welcome! You're already active on the forums from what I can see, and I look forward to talking with you :)

replies.body:
Welcome, Feel free to contact me or jozz for any enquiries.
(me and him are always linked)
And check out the staff page to get links to all the staffs profiles
www.avicus.net/staff
